purpose: Facilitates the deployment and execution of AI applications and agents in a secure cloud environment.
principle: Built on modern web technologies with a focus on security and open-source principles, leveraging popular frameworks for seamless AI app deployment.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with plugins and API support for easy integration and customization.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include limited features and potential stability issues.
name: E2B
description: Secure open source cloud runtime for AI apps & AI agents
highlight: Provides a secure and open-source cloud runtime environment tailored for AI applications and agents.
